description: OUTDATED, HISTORICAL VERSION -- Point data representing CTA park and ride locations. Details include number of spaces, cost, and rail station. To view or use these files, special GIS software, such as Google Earth, is required.

name: CTA - Park & Ride Locations - KML (Deprecated February 2015)
